original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=7 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=17 AND v.VoteTypeId=5 AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-08-01 02:54:53' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-19 06:26:34' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 05:22:26' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 7) AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 17)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-01 02:54:53'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5.Id=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND users.Views >= 0 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-19 06:26:34' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 05:22:26')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E5E3.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 5
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3E6E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5E3E6.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E3E6E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E3E6E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E5E3E6E4.Id)
